column5: For those who use the border crossing at International Falls, has the bridge toll of $6 for the tow vehicle and $4 for the trailer changed? I couldn't make it last year. My wife had shoulder replacement surgery and that tied up the entire summer.
Same as it's been for years, $6 for the car, $4 for the trailer.

Reports from my guests crossing this past Saturday experienced a 2 hour wait and felt the bottleneck was at the toll booth.....once past that point there was no line up. The toll booth is one of my pet peeves.
You have to remember that the concrete bridge belongs to the paper company. The "official" bridge is the railroad trestle.
Still $10. We were the only car in line and had to wait for someone to show up at 3:30 AM.
